content: adirondack babie summer skull cap guage rounds 1-4 equals 4 75 diameter worsted weight yarn g hook chain 3 join with slip_stitch to first chain round 1 chain 5 count as first double_crochet plus 2 chain double_crochet in ring *chain 2 double_crochet in ring* repeat * until you have 12 double_crochet then ch2 and join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 round 2 chain 5 double_crochet inside 1 chain 2 space *chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space st chain 2 double_crochet in the next double_crochet* repeat * until you have 24 double_crochet then join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 round 3-5 chain 5 double_crochet in 1 chain 2 space * chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space * st repeat around making sure you only have 24 double_crochet you might have to skip the last chain 2 space to keep it at 24 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top chain 3 round 6 chain 5 double_crochet in 1 chain 2 space * chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space * st repeat until you have 6 double_crochet chain 2 then double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 repeat to until you have 27 double_crochet then join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 round 7 - 11 chain 5 double_crochet in 1st chain 2 space *chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space * repeat around making sure you only have 27 double_crochet you might have to skip the last chain 2 space to keep it at 27 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top chain 3 finish off weave in ends wash and shape for personal use only you can purchase more copies for friends or family at www adirondackbabie com please do not redistribute your copy you have my permission to make and sell items from this pattern as a work at home parent making them by hand yourself i ask that you please reference that you used the adirondack babie skull cap pattern and a link to my site please do not mass produce these or hire out
